GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.94
GSD.description:
xfrm/compat: prevent potential spectre v1 gadget in xfrm_xlate32_attr()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.94 by commit 5dc688fae6b7be9dbbf5304a3d2520d038e06db5, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 5106f4a8acff480e244300bc5097c0ad7048c3a2. For more details please see the references link.
